TopicTitle: What was that joystick mod again?

Articles.Content:
I remember a mod that made it MUCH easier to use a joystick and switch between keybinds, does anyone know it? If it doesn't exist, could someone \*please\* make it?

I can't fly squat 1.0. Nothing is remotely stable, it all falls over. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
